title: Indian chicken pie
description: A great alternative to pork pie, this hand-raised pie has a flavour-packed chicken filling.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a 20cm/8in springform cake tin.
ingredients: 800g/1lb 12 oz boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 2.5cm/1in cubes
100g/3½oz solid vegetable fat (such as Cookeen or Trex), plus extra for greasing
